title: American Idol's Catie Turner Does It Her Way
description:
Catie Turner has always been herself, but didn’t know where she belonged until she sang her way onto American Idol at the age of 17. Her unique personality and soulful voice made her an instant fan favorite. Today, she’s still the same girl, but she knows exactly where she belongs.

Follow Catie on Instagram, Twitter, Facebook and TikTok

To listen to Catie’s music on your platform of choice, check out her website

Photo credit: Jimmy Fontaine

Listen ad free with Wondery+. Join Wondery+ for exclusives, binges, early access, and ad free listening. Available in the Wondery App. 

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes
